title: Ashok Leyland commences delivery of electric trucks to Billion Electric Mobility
description: Ashok Leyland has started delivering electric trucks to Billion Electric Mobility. The first set includes AVTR 55 tonne, BOSS 19 tonne, and BOSS 14 tonne electric trucks. These trucks will be used on the Chennai-Bengaluru and Chennai-Vijayawada routes. The event was attended by top officials from both companies.
